017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.lang.constant.Constable;
020import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
021import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
024
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.Optional;
027
028import org.microbean.development.annotation.Experimental;
029
030import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
031import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
032import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
033import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC;
034
035import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualified;
036import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualifiers;
037
038@Experimental
039public record Qualified<T>(Qualifiers<?> qualifiers, T qualified) implements Constable {
040
041
042  /*
043   * Canonical constructor.
044   */
045
046  
047  public Qualified {
048    qualifiers = Objects.requireNonNull(qualifiers, "qualifiers");
049  }
050
051
052  /*
053   * Instance methods.
054   */
055
056  
057  @Override // Constable
058  public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
059    final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> qualifiersDesc = this.qualifiers().describeConstable();
060    if (qualifiersDesc.isPresent()) {
061      final T qualified = this.qualified();
062      final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> qualifiedDesc;
063      if (qualified == null) {
064        qualifiedDesc = Optional.of(NULL);
065      } else if (qualified instanceof Constable c) {
066        qualifiedDesc = c.describeConstable();
067      } else {
068        qualifiedDesc = Optional.empty();
069      }
070      if (qualifiedDesc.isPresent()) {
071        return
072          Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
073                                             MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(STATIC,
074                                                                       CD_Qualified,
075                                                                       "of",
076                                                                       MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Qualified,
077                                                                                         CD_Qualifiers,
078                                                                                         CD_Object))));
079      }
080    }
081    return Optional.empty();
082  }
083
084
085  /*
086   * Static methods.
087   */
088
089  
090  public static final <T> Qualified<T> of(final Qualifiers<?> qualifiers, final T qualified) {
091    return new Qualified<>(qualifiers, qualified);
092  }
093
094}
